info.title: NE NodeJS Rest API
info.description: A REST API for managing parking slots, vehicles, users, and authentication

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Endpoints for user authentication and registration

tags.name: ParkingSlot Orders
tags.description: Endpoints for managing parking slot orders

post.description: Logs in a user with email and password, returns a JWT token

400.description: Invalid input or email already exists

post.description: Resets user password using a token
Verifies user email using a token

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users with optional search
Retrieves a specific user by ID
Retrieves a paginated list of parking slot orders for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new parking slot order and sends a confirmation email

404.description: Parking slot or vehicle not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific parking slot order by ID

delete.description: Deletes a parking slot order by ID

patch.description: Updates the status of a parking slot order

200.description: Parking slot order status updated successfully

get.description: Retrieves parking slot orders by parking slot ID
Retrieves parking slot orders by user ID
Retrieves a paginated list of parking slots with optional filters

message.example: Maximum slots limit reached for this parking

get.description: Retrieves a specific parking slot by ID

404.description: Parking slot or parking not found

delete.description: Deletes a parking slot by ID

message.example: Requested slots exceed maximum slots limit

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of vehicles with optional filters
Retrieves vehicles for the authenticated user
Retrieves a specific vehicle by ID
Retrieves a vehicle by plate number
Retrieves a paginated list of parking areas with optional slot category filter
Retrieves a specific parking area by ID
